title: Live From DAS: The Return of Bitcoin-Backed Lending | John Glover

Okay John let's just kick it off quickly
Quick intro about yourself Quick intro

I'm the CIO of Letin Uh Leen is a first

Let's let's just start it simple right
Why Bitcoin What what makes Bitcoin this

Well I come from uh many many years in
Tradfi as a lot of us do and uh when I
look at the collateral that we were
accepting when I was in the banking

stocks or other uh asset classes that

closed in the evenings Um and so you had
price gap risk and when you're accepting
that as collateral and you have a
liquidation threshold you've got this
gap risk that you know someone you've
got Tesla stock that you've taken as
collateral and Elon does something crazy
over the weekend and Tesla opens 10%
lower and now you're exposed to this
this potential loss Um so Bitcoin has
247 365 markets very very deep and
growing liquidity Um so you just don't
have that exposure to uh you know
something going wrong when you're
sleeping and the market's closed you

how about you give us a more holistic

years ago from the you know the

it's been a really interesting journey

I've got a lot more since I got here But
um so when when I joined uh Leen I was I
was hired to help with the risk

They wouldn't they weren't transparent
at all about their uh their

the way the market was growing Um and
I've got just this little anecdote to

like eight months later that everything

just traditional smart risk management
in credit underwriting in market
exposure in making sure that we were
very transparent to our clients and what

um for a long time And so we suffered

Um the rest of our book is funded

they're measured for uh LTV every 60

The balance of the uh Bitcoin collateral

we've done $1.2 billion worth of uh
